description:
when compute layer set_admin_password fails, it will log like:

Failed to set admin password on xxx-xxx-xx because
Failed to set admin password.Instance xxx-xxx-xx
is not running.

it's not accurate, should be adjusted
title: set_admin_password failed log is not correct

comments.content:
when compute layer set_admin_password fails, it will log like:

Failed to set admin password on xxx-xxx-xx because
Failed to set admin password.Instance xxx-xxx-xx
is not running.

it's not accurate, should be adjusted
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/144683
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=f0eb7763fc684d6c7b0ad33386a6bb0b997ae8ee
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit f0eb7763fc684d6c7b0ad33386a6bb0b997ae8ee
Author: jichenjc <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jan 1 06:34:15 2015 +0800

    Change log when set_admin_password failed
    
    currently if set_admin_password fails, it
    will report error logs like:
    
    Failed to set admin password on xxx-xxx-xx because
    Failed to set admin password.Instance xxx-xxx-xx
    is not running.
    
    it's not accurate, this patch remove unnecessary logs.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1407002
    
    Change-Id: I30c2977f5c182598618a6d9a312b3b82aaebdd1c
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
